publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 132
ab.l: Širasy ol maʿalalarnyn saɣynɣyn e H David́ǵa bar qyjyn ḱot́urǵaniń.
Ki ant́et́ti H-ɣa nijet́ et́ti ḱuč́ĺu Teńrisińa Jaʿaqovnun.
Eǵer keĺśam čatyryna juv́um- ńuń eǵer mińśam t́oš́agi üśt́uńa qrovatymnyn.
Eǵer b́erśam juqunu ḱoźĺariḿa kirpikĺariḿa čyrymny.
Ńegińč́a tapḥejmyn orun aronuna H-nyn toḥtar orun miš́kanyna ḱuč́ĺu Teńrisińa Jaʿaqovnun.
Muna ešit́tik any Efratta taptyḥ any t́uźuń- d́a ormannyn.
Kelajik toḥtar orunlaryna bašurajyḥ ornuna buj- ruḥlarynyn.
Turɣun e H tynčlyɣyja śeń da aron quvatyj.
Koheńĺarij kijsińĺar rastlyḥny da ḥasid́ĺarij sarnasynlar.
David́ quluj üč́uń boš qajtarmaɣyn juźĺariń Mašijaḥyjnyn.
Antet́ti H David́ǵa kerti śoź byla qajtmastyr śoźuńd́ań jemišińd́ań qursaɣyjnyn qojarmyn oltu- ruvču taḥtyj üśt́uńa śeniń.
Eǵer saqlasalar ulanlaryj šertimni da šarajatymny bu ki üv́ŕat́tim daɣy ulanlaryda dunjaɣa dejiń oltu- rurlar taḥtyj üśt́uńa śeniń.
Ki sajlady H Cijonnu biĺgiĺadi ol- turušḥa öźuńa.
Budur tynčlyɣym dunjaɣa dejiń bu orunda oltururmyn ki śuv́d́um any.
Azyɣyn alɣyšlama alɣyšlarmyn miśkińĺariń tojdururmyn et́ḿakt́ań.
Da koheńĺarińa kijdirirmiń jar- lyɣaš da ḥasid́ĺari sarnama sarnarlar.
Anda öśt́uŕurmiń d́ev́ĺat́iń David́niń t́uźurmiń bijligiń śurt́uĺḿuš́umńuń.
Dušmanlaryna kijdi- rirmiń ujat da anyn üśt́uńa č́eč́akĺanir taǯy anyn.
